backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (custom category deletion, emoji auto-suggest, logo consistency, password hints) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a build/documentation reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including colors for background, primary, sidebar, charts, and border variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the favicon, page title 'Task Queue â€” Your Productivity Hub', and loading DM Sans from Google Fonts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing view state between login, signup, and dashboard, persisting session on mount and rendering a Sonner Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/CustomPopup.tsx: Reusable modal popup component supporting error, info, and confirm dialog types with Escape key dismissal, backdrop click, and animated scale-in styling.
Sticky top navigation header displaying the Task Queue logo image, a search bar with clear button, a Gmail-style user avatar, and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Renders a sidebar with category navigation, supporting adding new categories with keyword-based emoji suggestions and deleting existing ones.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Displays a single task card with title, description, status/priority badges, due date, and edit/delete actions, with search query highlighting support.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Renders a responsive grid of TaskCard components or a contextual empty state message based on active tab, category, or search query.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Modal form for creating or editing a task, with fields for title, description, category, status, due date, and priority.
frontend/src/components/VerificationModa: Modal that prompts the user to enter a 6-digit email verification code, displaying the code on-screen in demo mode and marking the user as verified on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet using Tailwind CSS with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and keyframe animations for slide, scale, and card reveal effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page component that manages tasks and categories for a logged-in user, supporting filtering by tab/category/search and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page component with email/phone and password fields that authenticates users and shows error popups on failure.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Signup page component that collects user details, validates input, triggers account creation, and shows an email verification modal on success.
frontend/src/utils/auth.ts: Authentication utility providing login, signup, and logout functions with validation logic, session management, and email verification code generation.
frontend/src/utils/avatar.ts: Utility functions that derive a deterministic avatar background color and initial letter from a user's name.
frontend/src/utils/notifications.ts: Thin wrapper around the Sonner toast library that exposes a unified showNotification function supporting success, info, and warning types.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces (User, Task, CategoryEntry) and localStorage CRUD helpers for users, sessions, tasks, and per-user categories, including default category presets and backward-compatibility handling.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides utility functions for validating email and phone formats, plus a highlightText helper that wraps query matches in styled <mark> tags.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom navy/sky/surface color palettes using oklch, DM Sans font, custom border radii, box shadows, and accordion keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 15) for the Task Queue React/TypeScript app, documenting architectural decisions, existing features, known issues, and design/tech constraints.
